page.title: 16LIVING LESS HIGH
page.content: LIVING LESS HIGH IN EAST KILBRIDE In our area there are many different types of houses such as semi-detached, detached, terraced, bungalows and cottages. The most common type is the terraced. This is because the Development Corporation have built more terraced houses than any other type. East Kilbride is a pleasant place to live as the Parks Department are always planting more trees and more flowers and the Development Corporation have planned the houses not in straight rows but in interesting layouts. Most houses in East Kilbride are situated around a park or play areas so that there is a place for children to play. Because more people are moving to East Kilbride the Development Corpor- ation are having to build more houses.
